summary: Converts string properties into numbers in literal object definitions

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Minimize the following script: var lit = {"0102":"Zero One Zero Two"}; alert(lit["0102"]); What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected: var lit={"0102":"Zero One Zero Two"};alert(lit["0102"]); Actual: var lit={102:"Zero One Zero Two"};alert(lit["0102"]); What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? r1459 Please provide any additional information below.
I should add that this happens in WHITESPACE_ONLY mode.
This issue was closed by revision r1491.
Issue 595 has been merged into this issue.
